thread.section_title: LightInTheBox 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 LightInTheBox 的点评意见 | www.lightinthebox.com
thread.title: Brandi Putnam
thread.title_full: LightInTheBox 的点评人 Brandi Putnam

author: Brandi Putnam
title: Brandi Putnam
text: I have ordered 2 dresses from this website and was very impressed. I did take my measurements prior to ordering the dress and based my dress sizes according to the size chart. I did have to order 1-2 sizes larger than my normal dress sizes. Both dresses arrived quickly and were beautiful! Looking forward to wearing to a ball tomorrow.
